name: Le Rouge Deep Velvet Long Lasting Matte Lipstick
description: The formula of Le Rouge lipstick is enriched with Hyaluronic Acid spheres and Akmella flower extract, which smooth and increase the volume of the lips, and also have a moisturizing effect.

name: Lipstick 'STAR GLOW' GLOW MANIA collection
description: The new GLOW MANIA collection is bright, daring and bold! This collection will help you shine at any party, creating your own unique and memorable image that will remain in the memory of others for a long time!

name: 'Color Riche' Moisturizing Lipstick
description: Color Riche has been L'Or√©al Paris' iconic lipstick since 1985. Color Rish is a combination of rich color pigments and precious oils in one bottle. Satin finish, gliding application, rich palette of shades. 75% caring components in the composition. Camellia and lotus extracts, argan and jojoba oil deeply nourish and moisturize the delicate skin of the lips. More than color. The luxury of color and care for your lips.

name: Lipstick: Intense Color & Shine THE ONLY ONE refill
description: Dolce&Gabbana presents THE ONLY ONE, a lipstick with multiple designs to make you feel unique.

name: Liquid lipstick Matte lip color 201
description: It has a very delicate, creamy texture, gives the lips a perfectly long-lasting matte color and gives a feeling of comfort. The convenient beveled sponge allows you to quickly and evenly distribute lipstick, making lips bright and attractive with a velvety matte effect.

name: Rouge Dior Forever Liquid Long Wear Lipstick
description: Rouge Dior Forever Liquid is Dior's first ultra-pigmented, non-marking liquid lipstick with vibrant ultra-matte color. Amazing depth of color remains clearly on the lip line, does not fade, does not fade or smear even under a mask or in contact with fabric. The unique formula of Rouge Dior Forever Liquid redefines longevity. This lipstick does not create the effect of heavy makeup, it is practically not felt on the lips and does not leave marks. Rouge Dior Forever Liquid covers your lips in a perfectly even layer and delivers exceptional color vibrancy. Rouge Dior Forever Liquid Matte Lipstick provides optimal coverage for 12 hours, while maintaining a feeling of comfort, whatever the challenges of everyday life you have to deal with.

name: Dior Addict Lip Tatoo
description: Dior Addict Lip Tattoo is Dior's first long-lasting lip tint that infuses lips with light and shimmery color that enhances natural lip color. The weightless coating provides an incredibly comfortable feeling.The carefully crafted formula of Lip Tattoo allows you to give kisses without fear of leaving a mark on your lover's lips. Within seconds of application, the color sinks into the lips for an incredibly comfortable finish without the feel of make-up on the skin.

name: Lipstick Limited Edition
description: Show off your style with VIP Audacious Lipstick. Exclusive design and 5 popular shades: brown-pink Barbara, warm pink Anita, bright red Audrey, brown-red Mona and scarlet Rita. Limited edition.

name: Professional Makeup Matte Cream Liquid Lipstick
description: It's not a lipstick or a gloss, it's a matte liquid cream lipstick! Only Soft Matte Lip Cream boasts satiny texture, matte finish, long lasting hold and hydration for your lips at the same time.

name: Long Wear Lipfinity
description: Persistent lipstick Lipfinity trademark MAX FACTOR allows you to give your lips an expressive, rich shade, emphasizing the features of the natural form. Thanks to the presence of reflective particles, the lipstick adapts to any change in natural and artificial light, giving lips incredible shine and expressiveness. MAX FACTOR Lipfinity comes in a stylish bottle with a soft applicator. The flat shape of the brush helps to evenly apply and distribute lipstick on the lips, painting over the contour.

name: 'Les Chocolats' Liquid Matte Lipstick 16h Wear
description: Persistent lipstick Lipfinity trademark MAX FACTOR allows you to give your lips an expressive, rich shade, emphasizing the features of the natural form. Thanks to the presence of reflective particles, the lipstick adapts to any change in natural and artificial light, giving lips incredible shine and expressiveness. MAX FACTOR Lipfinity comes in a stylish bottle with a soft applicator. The flat shape of the brush helps to evenly apply and distribute lipstick on the lips, painting over the contour.

name: Ombre Blush
description: Silky powder blush that provides true color with a natural looking, long-lasting finish. Made in China.
